name: Accounting
detail: the process of recording, assessing, and communicating financial transactions

name: Biochemistry
detail: the branch of science that explores the chemical processes within and related to living organisms

name: Biology
detail: a branch of science that deals with living organisms and their vital processes.

name: Physics
detail: Physics is one of the most fundamental scientific disciplines, and its main goal is to understand how the universe behaves.

name: Chemistry
detail: the scientific study of the properties and behavior of matter.

name: Computer science
detail: the study of computers and computing as well as their theoretical and practical applications.

name: Economics
detail: Economics is the social science that studies how people interact with value.

name: Finance
detail: the management of money and includes activities such as investing, borrowing, lending, budgeting, saving, and forecasting.

name: Management
detail: the administration of an organization, whether it is a business, a non-profit organization, or a government body.
